import React, { Component } from 'react' import Layout from "./Layout"; import { urlOfImages } from "./images"; import fetch from 'isomorphic-fetch'; class Query extends Component{ constructor() { super(); this.state = { questionList :['swjdbwej'] } } static async getInitialProps() { console.log('ran'); const res = await fetch('http://localhost:8000/questions/'); const questionList = await res.json(); console.log(questionList); return { questionList } } componentDidMount() { console.log(this.props.questionList); fetch('http://localhost:8000/questions/') .then(response => response.json()) .then((res)=>{ console.log(res.questionList); this.setState( {questionList : [...res.questionList]}); }) } renderTest(){ console.log(this.state.questionList); return (<> { this.state.questionList.map((question)=>{ return
{question.question}
Answers { question.answers.map((answer)=>{ return
{answer.answer}
-- {answer.author.name}
})}
})} ); }; render(){ return( {this.renderTest()}
